original_title: In the Footsteps of Marco Polo
overview: In the Footsteps of Marco Polo is a 2008 PBS documentary film detailing Denis Belliveau and Francis O'Donnell's 1993 retracing of Marco Polo's journey from Venice to Anatolia, Persia, India and China.
tagline: Some people dream big dreams. Only a few bold adventurers live them.
title: In the Footsteps of Marco Polo
